summary: A powerful spellsword found in Markarth.
descriptionHtml:
Naomi Stormlake is a very powerful Spellsword Follower. 
She\'s found at the Silver-blood inn 
She also has abit of custom dialogue about herself.

Naomi Stormlake:
Race - Nord
Level - 40
Class - Spellsword
Default armor - Ebony set without helmet/shield
Weapon of choice - 1H Ebony sword
Secondary Weapon - 2H Ebony sword
Primary attack - Lighting Bolt
Marriable - Yes

Spells
Lighting Bolt
Raise Zombie
Healing
Heal other (not sure if it works)

V2 - fixed crash regarding packages

Armor Replacer - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3654  (Seen in screenshots)
author: SpiderAkiraC
